#summary Map of SVN commands for each SCC operation.

== commands for "svn lock" object locking strategy ==

 * `SccQueryInfo`
  * svn update
 * `SccCheckout`
  * svn update (force)
  * svn lock
  * copy files
 * `SccUncheckout`
  * svn update (force)
  * svn unlock
 * `SccCheckin`
  * svn update (force)
  * copy files
  * svn commit
 * `SccAdd`
  * svn update (force)
  * copy files
  * svn add
  * svn commit
 * `SccGet`
  * svn update (force)
  * copy files
 * `SccRemove`
  * svn update (force)
  * svn delete
  * svn commit
 * `SccHistory`
  * tortoiseproc.exe /command:log
